attributes.action: Add more street lamps for drivers in camrthenshire
attributes.background: I want the government to add more street lamps because of the dangers on the road

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about roads in Wales are a matter for the relevant highway authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about lighting on local roads could raise your concerns with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you are concerned about lighting on local roads you can find details of the relevant highway authorities here: https://www.gov.wales/managing-our-roads
